responseText: Curious fonts of essence, aren't they? I have little doubt we will come to learn more about them and all the mysteries of this world in time. Since you've indulged me, allow me to offer you a token of goodwill and prosperity from the Consortium. I know that by working together, we'll recapture all that was lost to us here.
name: DD_0100_SamiasHopeAmbassador_3_Response
